name: Proto-Human Fight Club
description:
A game made in 5 days for the Unreal Engine May 2018 Game Jam. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • LMB to attack
  • RMB to block
  • Space to jump
  • Shift + space to lunge forward
  • C to crouch
  • Esc or M to open pause menu
  • E to celebrate
  • Q to throw away bone
  • Ctrl + O to turn off music
